definition: to be a guest or visitor

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: He would not sleep like a corpse, nor stt like a guest.
sentences.chinese: 孔子睡覺不像死屍那樣僵直，家居不像做客那樣端坐。

sentences.english: I hope you will come to Xi'an again.
sentences.chinese: 希望您能再次來西安做客。

sentences.english: "I think they can go to Arsenal full of confidence, " said Molby.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們做客阿森納帶着滿滿的自信。

sentences.english: Hello, I'm Regen. Welcome to my house.
sentences.chinese: 我叫海韻，歡迎來我的房子做客。

sentences.english: When you visit an English man's home for the first time, what kind of gift should you bring ?
sentences.chinese: 第一次去英國人家裏做客，你應帶什麼樣的禮物？

sentences.english: They came to our house last month.
sentences.chinese: 上個月她們到過我們家做客。

sentences.english: I look forward to welcoming my old club to Prenton Park ahead of the new season.
sentences.chinese: 季前賽我歡迎我的老東家做客普雷頓公園。

sentences.english: Invite friends or relatives into your home.
sentences.chinese: 邀請親戚朋友來家中做客。

sentences.english: Hopefully we can get the three points and we go there with confidence.
sentences.chinese: 希望我們能夠全取三分，我們做客曼城自信滿滿。

sentences.english: I hope you will come to Xi'each however.
sentences.chinese: 希看你能再次來西安做客。

sentences.english: Some farmers invited us to their houses.
sentences.chinese: 一些農民邀請我們去他們家裏做客。

sentences.english: Mascherano will be back in contention for next weekend's trip to Fulham.
sentences.chinese: 馬斯切拉諾將會回到週日做客富勒姆的比賽。

sentences.english: I hope you will come to Shenyang again.
sentences.chinese: 希望你能再次來西安做客。

sentences.english: Mon June 6th A pre-season friendly at Benfica is confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 月6日星期一做客本菲卡的賽季前熱身賽敲定。

sentences.english: I hope you will come to Xi'a wonderful once.
sentences.chinese: 希望你能再次來西安做客。

sentences.english: In past years, a neighbour dressed as Santa Claus and entertained guests.
sentences.chinese: 過去的幾年中，有一名鄰居打扮成聖誕老人來做客。

definition: to live somewhere as a visitor/to stay with sb as a guest/to sojourn
(of a commanding officer) to keep watch/to oversee
to pay a visit/to call on
to invite/to request/to intercept/to solicit/to seek
erhua variant of 串門|串门[chuan4 men2]
to call on sb/to drop in/to visit sb's home
to act as host/to do the honors
